title: Would love some help - typeface suggestions.
content:
Hi all

I am creating invitations for my wedding and would greatly appreciate some (affordable) type suggestions. I find that since I am doing it myself, I am overwhelmed by the abundant options for typefaces out there. I am designing the invitation with an nod to art nouveau - I am using an art nouveau-inspired peacock graphic that I have done myself - but I do not necessarily want a literal art nouveau font. Sorry I don't have a picture of the graphic, it's not available on the computer I'm currently on.

Thanks in advance.
author: natalie_F

comments.content: Without seeing the peacock or knowing you personally it's going to be difficult to suggest suitable fonts. Maybe have a scan through MyFonts with keywords you like? Like 19th century or art nouveau. Or go for a particular mood?
